name: biomni-query-alphafold
title: Biomni: Query Alphafold
description: Query the AlphaFold Database for AI-predicted 3D protein structures with high accuracy confidence scores.
content:
Overview

Accesses the AlphaFold Database to retrieve AI-predicted 3D protein structures. AlphaFold, developed by DeepMind, provides highly accurate protein structure predictions for millions of proteins, revolutionizing structural biology research.

Input Parameters

  • uniprot_id (string, required): UniProt accession ID for the protein of interest (e.g., "P12345")
  • endpoint (string, optional): Specific API endpoint to query (default: "prediction")
  • residue_range (string, optional): Specific residue range to retrieve (e.g., "1-100")
  • download (boolean, optional): Whether to download structure files (default: false)
  • output_dir (string, optional): Directory path for downloaded files
  • file_format (string, optional): Structure file format - "pdb" or "cif" (default: "pdb")
  • model_version (string, optional): AlphaFold model version (default: "v4")
  • model_number (integer, optional): Model number to retrieve (default: 1)

Input Format

Create a JSON file with the following structure:

{
  "uniprot_id": "P12345",
  "endpoint": "prediction",
  "download": true,
  "file_format": "pdb",
  "model_version": "v4"
}

Biological Use Case

Essential for researchers studying protein function, drug design, and molecular interactions when experimental structures are unavailable. AlphaFold predictions enable structural analysis of disease-related proteins, identification of drug binding sites, understanding protein-protein interactions, and guiding experimental studies in structural biology and biochemistry.

Output

Returns a JSON file (alphafold_results.json) containing predicted structure data, per-residue confidence scores (pLDDT), predicted aligned error (PAE) matrices, and optionally downloaded PDB/CIF structure files with atomic coordinates and confidence annotations.

Category

database
